PROGRAM atcoder_ARC102_C
  IMPLICIT NONE
  INTEGER, PARAMETER :: MOD = 998244353
  INTEGER(8), DIMENSION(0:4000,0:4000) :: nchoosek
  INTEGER :: i, j, k, n, pairs, active, active_term
  INTEGER(8) :: times2, total

  ! Initialize nchoosek to zero
  DO i = 0, 4000
    DO j = 0, 4000
      nchoosek(i, j) = 0
    END DO
  END DO

  ! Base cases for nchoosek[i][0] and nchoosek[i][i]
  DO i = 0, 4000
    nchoosek(i, 0) = 1
    nchoosek(i, i) = 1
  END DO

  ! Fill in the rest of the nchoosek table using dynamic programming
  DO i = 2, 4000
    DO j = 1, i - 1
      nchoosek(i, j) = MOD(nchoosek(i-1, j) + nchoosek(i-1, j-1), MOD)
    END DO
  END DO

  ! Read input
  READ(*,*) k, n

  ! Main loop over i
  DO i = 2, 2*k
    IF (i > k) THEN
      pairs = k - (i / 2)
    ELSE
      pairs = (i - 1) / 2
    END IF

    active = k - 2 * pairs
    IF (MOD(i, 2) == 0) THEN
      active = active - 1
    END IF

    times2 = 1_8
    total = 0_8

    DO j = 0, pairs
      IF (active + j - 1 < 0) THEN
        CYCLE
      END IF

      ! Compute the contribution
      ! First term: C(n+active-1, active+j-1)
      INTEGER :: active_term = active + j - 1
      INTEGER :: n_active_minus_1 =n + active -1
      INTEGER(8) term1, term2 =0_8

      ! Compute combination for first term
      IF (n_active_minus_1 < active_term) THEN
        term1 =0
      ELSE
        INTEGER(8) :: comb1 = nchoosek(n_active_minus_1, active_term)
        term1 = MOD( times2 * comb1, MOD )
      END IF

      term2 =0_8
      IF (MOD(i,2) == 0) THEN
        INTEGER :: n_active_minus_2 =n_active_minus_1 -1
        IF (n_active_minus_2 < active_term) THEN
          comb2 = 0
        ELSE
          comb2 = nchoosek(n_active_minus_2, active_term)
        END IF
        term2 = MOD( comb2 * times2 , MOD )
      END IF

      ! Update total with these terms
      total = MOD( total + term1 + term2, MOD )
      ! Update times2 for next iteration
      times2 = MOD( times2 * 2, MOD )

    END DO

    PRINT *, total

  END DO

END PROGRAM atcoder_ARC102_C

PROGRAM atcoder_ARC102_C
  IMPLICIT NONE
  INTEGER, PARAMETER :: MOD = 998244353
  INTEGER(8), DIMENSION(0:4000,0:4000) :: nchoosek = 0
  INTEGER :: i, j, k_val, n_val, pairs, active
  INTEGER(8) :: times2, total
 
  ! Initialize the combination table
  DO i = 0, 4000
    nchoosek(i, 0) = 1_8 ! Note: initial value
    nchoosek(i, i) = 1_8
  END DO

  DO i = 2, 4000
    DO j = 1, i-1
      nchoosek(i,j) = MOD( nchoosek(i-1, j) + nchoosek(i-1,j-1), MOD )
    END DO
  END DO

  ! Read input
  READ(*, *) k_val, n_val

  DO i = 2, 2*k_val
    ! Compute pairs and active
    IF (i > k_val) THEN
      pairs = k_val - (i/2)
    ELSE
      pairs = (i-1)/2
    END IF
    active = k_val - 2*pairs
    IF (MOD(i,2) ==0) active = active -1

    times2 = 1_8
    total = 0_8

    ! Loop over j
    DO j =0, pairs
      IF ( (active + j -1) <0 ) CYCLE
      
      ! Compute choice
      INTEGER(8) :: comb_j = nchoosek(pairs,j)
      INTEGER(8) :: choice = MOD( times2 * comb_j, MOD )

      ! Compute terms
      INTEGER :: term1_active = active +j -1
      INTEGER :: n_active = n_val + active -1
      INTEGER(8) :: term1 =0, term2 =0

      ! First term C(a, b)
      IF ( n_active >= term1_active ) THEN
        term1 = MOD( choice * nchoosek(n_active, term1_active), MOD )
      END IF

      ! Second term (if even i)
      IF ( MOD(i,2) ==0 ) THEN
        INTEGER :: n_active_minus_2 = n_active -1
        IF (n_active_minus_2 >= term1_active ) THEN
          term2 = MOD( choice * nchoosek( n_active_minus_2, term1_active ), MOD )
        END IF
      END IF

      ! Update the total
      total = MOD( total + term1 + term2, MOD )

      ! Update times2 for next iteration
      times2 = MOD( times2 * 2, MOD )
    END DO ! end j loop

    ! output the result mod MOD 
    PRINT *, MOD(total, MOD)  ! to ensure positivity?

  END DO ! end i loop

END PROGRAM atcoder_ARC102_C
